hero.title: Manage Your Queues Effortlessly with QueuePilot
hero.subtitle: Streamline operations, reduce wait times, and enhance customer satisfaction. Your ultimate solution for intelligent queue management.

features.title: Key Reasons to Choose QueuePilot
features.subtitle: Discover the powerful features that make QueuePilot the best choice for your clinic or business.

feature1.title: Optimized Patient Flow
feature1.description: Dramatically reduce wait times and improve overall operational efficiency with real-time queue visibility for proactive patient flow management.

feature2.title: Enhanced Experience for All
feature2.description: Intuitive UI for staff and doctors, plus a public display keeping patients informed, reducing anxiety and improving their overall clinic experience.

feature3.title: Comprehensive Management
feature3.description: From patient registration to managing doctors, specialties, offices, and public display ads—all key clinic operations in one platform.

feature4.title: Integrated Advertising
feature4.description: 40% of the screen space is dedicated to advertising, keeping customers informed about the company's services and products.

feature5.title: Insightful Reporting
feature5.description: Access detailed reports and statistics on clinic performance, wait times, and occupancy by doctor/specialty to make informed decisions.

feature6.title: Multilingual Support
feature6.description: Available in Spanish (default) and English, facilitating adoption in diverse environments and improving communication.

howItWorks.title: Simple Steps to Efficiency
howItWorks.subtitle: See how QueuePilot manages the patient journey from start to finish.

step1.title: 1. Easy Registration
step1.description: Patients are registered at reception. The system assigns a 'Waiting' status and a queue position for the selected doctor.

step2.title: 2. Informed Waiting & Calling
step2.description: Patients see their turn on public displays. Doctors call patients by changing their status to 'Calling', which is reflected on the display.

step3.title: 3. Consultation & Completion
step3.description: After consultation, the doctor marks the status as 'Completed'. This data is logged for analytics. No-shows/cancellations are also managed.

cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of businesses optimizing their queues with QueuePilot.

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.paragraph1: Welcome to QueuePilot. We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy notice, or our practices with regards to your personal information, please contact us at {{email}}.

We take your privacy very seriously. In this privacy notice, we seek to explain to you in the clearest way possible what information we collect, how we use it and what rights you have in relation to it. We hope you take some time to read through it carefully, as it is important. If there are any terms in this privacy notice that you do not agree with, please discontinue use of our Services immediately.
